welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Larkfield-Wikiup! Prepare to be charmed by our quaint city and its beautiful scenery. Take some time to explore and experience all that our charming town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sonoma County Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sonoma County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for a limited time. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.
